# 1. Introduction

[...]
Individual subjective values of cognitive effort have been quantified using the cognitive effort discounting paradigm (COG-ED) [@Westbrook2013]. 

## Adapting an effort discounting paradigm

In the original study by Westbrook et al. [-@Westbrook2013], cognitive load was varied using the *N*-back task. 
Participants had to decide whether repeating a higher *N*-back level for larger, fixed monetary reward, or a lower level for a smaller, variing reward.
